title: getting forced to surrender during gaming phase.
body: okay if u guys search up my recent vi and kayn game i was dced for 20secs to change internet for better connection after that at 5min game goes auto surrender then even tho i press no for the vote even if its 3yes/2no tthe game finishes and i get a auto lose. already lost the ggame twice i  want my points back it happened to my promos and lost 2 promos games cuz of this bug. if i dont get any rewards for the happening im just gonna quit this game.

replies.body:
Sounds like your team voted to remake.
Your own fault for playing what I assume from your words "change internet for better connection" is wireless. You should always play via Ethernet connection.

I had a free loss in ranked because a summoner on our team chose to play: knowingly that his internet connection was bad and that summoner had 6 straight ranked losses; even let the team know via pinging his ms/ping in-game and ask the team to carry him when he was zed mid.

I really **HATE** selfish summoners that play knowing that they make the team they are on have a disadvantage and ruining the gaming experience for others.
